data.description_html: This spell functions like light of Lunia, except that the radiance created is golden. Your light rays deal 2d6 points of damage, or 4d6 points of damage against undead and evil outsiders.
data.duration: 10 minutes/level (D) or until discharged; see text
data.name: Light of Mercuria
data.target: You and up to two rays; see text
